有無清講下莫拉達既踢法同實力如何?

有意大利媒體報導稱，在貝拿迪斯基的轉會問題上，祖雲達斯目前和費倫天拿之間只有300萬歐元左右的分歧。

雖然貝拿迪斯基剛剛否認了自己父親的言論(此前有媒體稱其父親在採訪中表示，他很高興看到自己的兒子能夠像巴治奧那樣從費倫天拿轉會到祖雲)，但一些媒體指出，這位意大利國腳並沒有歸隊參加費倫天拿的季前訓練營，(費倫天拿表示球員有嚴重腸胃炎) 這被認為是他轉會的前兆。

來自意大利媒體Premium Sport的報導就宣稱，祖雲已經和費倫天拿談妥了4000萬歐元的固定轉會費，只不過在獎金問題上，雙方還存在些許分歧。

該報導進一步表示，兩傢球會目前的分歧只有200萬至300萬歐元，因此未來幾個小時內貝拿迪斯基的轉會有可能就會有突破性的進展。

After the meeting between Juventus and Bernardeschi’s agent Beppe Bozzo concluded, it was revealed by Sky that the parties are extremely close to reaching a conclusion in the deal to send the Carrara-born star to Juve.

According to Sky Sport 24, the Bianconeri said no to Fiorentina in regards to including Stefano Sturaro in the deal. After Marko Pjaca saying no to a loan deal, Juventus have also refused to allow Sturaro to join the Tuscan side as they see him as part of their future plans. It now looks likely that Juventus will pay for the player completely in cash and will not include any players in the deal.

Breaking: Bernardeschi joins Juventus on five-year deal

According to Sky Sport Italia, Federico Bernardeschi's move from Fiorentina to Juventus has been confirmed. The 23-year-old will arrive in Turin for a fee of €40M with the player himself signing a five-year deal at the Serie A champions.

The two clubs have been locked in negotiations for several days now but it seems a breakthrough has finally been made. Fiorentina were initially asking for €50M for their star player and reports this morning suggested that although the bianconeri were not prepared to match that figure, a deal was believed to be very close.

Bernardeschi’s future in Tuscany has looked uncertain since towards the end of last season when the Italian international refused to commit to a new deal at the club. With Juventus waiting in the background, the chance to play alongside Gianluigi Buffon, who heralds from the same city of Carrara was an opportunity too good to turn down.

森多利亞射手希克的經紀人表示，希克轉會祖雲失敗的原因非常複雜。

希克原本準備以3000萬歐元加盟祖雲，但體檢出心臟有問題，他需要至少休息一個月的時間。而希克的經紀人Pavel Paska 在捷克接受iSport採訪時，表示心臟問題並不是轉會失敗的原因。

Pavel Paska 說：“這很難解釋，最近幾週發生了很多事，對於所有牽涉其中的人都是一段艱難的時間。希克在去年7月末跟隨布拉格斯巴達開始了新賽季，然後很快就去了森多利亞。他踢了一整年的比賽，只在聖誕節休息了8天。他的最後一場比賽是6月24日的歐青賽，他才21歲，他踢的比賽太多了。”

“他在意甲踢到了5月末，休息了2天，就立即坐飛機去參加比賽。他去了比利時和挪威，坐了很久的飛機。同時他還受到了心絞痛的困擾，然後他去參加了歐青賽，踢了3場非常艱難的比賽。他整個賽季踢了44場比賽。”

“這樣的運動量和巨大的壓力讓他的健康出現了問題，出現心絞痛症狀後，他的心臟有些感染和發炎。所有的醫生都表示他們將盡全力保證希克的健康，希克只是太累了，而且由於感染他現在不能接受藥物治療。在捷克，醫生都認為這不是大事，但在意大利醫生會很緊張，心臟專家表示這種情況有些嚴重。”

“所以是祖雲撤回了合同？並不是這樣的，希克的身體情況和轉會沒有關係，儘管他需要治療，但祖雲希望繼續完成這筆轉會，祖雲認為這樣的情況是可以接受的。很多運動員都有類似的健康問題，這並不嚴重，只是疲勞導致的。”

“當我們來到都靈時，希克剛剛和意大利踢完一場比賽，他早上6點就起床趕飛機，而他一直承受著壓力，這影響了他的健康。之前我也沒遇到過這樣的事，我在布拉格的醫院找了心臟專科醫生來給他檢查。”

“希克在轉會森多之前的體檢完全沒有問題，只是因為這個賽季太有挑戰性了，疲勞導致了他的健康出現問題。他的健康問題應該在5週內就可以解決，我也是親眼看到了希克度過了一個多麼疲憊的賽季。所以我告訴祖雲和森多，希克需要一個5週的假期，這是希克在羅馬接受完第二次檢查後，醫生給出的建議。 ”

“等希克回到森多後，他會接受每年的常規體檢，然後我們再看他是留在森多訓練，還是單獨進行恢復訓練。”

MESSI'S FAVOURITE NEYMAR REPLACEMENTS

Lionel Messi has given Barcelona a list of candidates he wants to replace Neymar should he join Paris Saint-Germain, according to Don Balon.

PSG are ready to lure Neymar to the French capital by matching his €222 million release clause, leaving Barca in the hunt for a new star attacker.

Messi has endorsed Paulo Dybala for the role and the Juventus attacker is said to be the club's main candidate. Should they fail in that pursuit, though, Messi wants them to go after PSG's Angel Di Maria or Borussia Dortmund attacker Ousmane Dembele.

艾歷尼：我不擔心失去保羅戴巴拿

祖雲達斯主帥艾歷尼表示，他並不擔心失去阿根廷前鋒保羅戴巴拿。

最近有傳聞稱，如果尼馬轉會巴黎聖日耳門的話，巴塞隆拿將向祖雲達斯求購保羅戴巴拿。

艾歷尼在當地時間的週五接受採訪時表示：“我並不擔心失去保羅戴巴拿。巴塞隆拿是否需要引進尼馬的替代者？我不瞭解尼馬和巴黎聖日耳門的情況，因此我不知道尼馬離隊這個前提是否成立。我並不擔心。”

23歲的保羅戴巴拿在今年4月份和祖雲達斯續約至了2022年6月，他目前的税後年薪為700萬歐元，是祖雲達斯隊內的第二高薪，僅次於希古恩。

Barcelona are considering Juventus’ Paulo Dybala or Lorenzo Insigne of Napoli as potential Neymar replacements, according to reports.

The Brazilian forward could join Paris Saint-Germain in the coming days for a record fee of €222m, with the French side ready to pay his release clause.

That would see the famous ‘MSN’ frontline of Lionel Messi, Luis Suarez and Neymar broken up, and Gazzetta dello Sport reports the Blaugrana are looking in Italy for a replacement.

Dybala would be an obvious choice, given the comparisons with Messi, though he doesn’t play the same position as Neymar.

Gazzetta also claims that Insigne is a target, after 18 goals and nine assists in Serie A last season.

These reports should be taken with a pinch of salt though, as both players recently signed new contracts with their respective clubs.

Dybala signed a five-year contract in April which made him Juve’s top earner alongside Gonzalo Higuain.

Insigne also signed a five-year renewal in April, stating “I hope to never take this shirt off”.

好彩唔同位 買恩悉尼啦

Gonzalo Higuain urges Paulo Dybala to stay at Juventus - “we all want him to stay”.

Neymar is reportedly close to a world record €222m move to Paris Saint-Germain, and it has been suggested that Barcelona could turn to Dybala to replace him.

“Dybala is at a delicate age which I’ve already experienced,” Higuain explained to Gazzetta dello Sport.

“I went to Real [Madrid] at 19 and I was there until I was 25, but I was at an important club for a long time.

“Everyone wants to play with great players, and I can’t point a gun at his head and tell him to stay. Everyone should do what makes them happy, like he is here, and we all want him to stay.

“Can he win the Champions League here? Last year we were convinced we could win it and we got to the final, this year will be tougher because the other teams have strengthened.

“It’s not just to win the Champions League that he should stay, but for the seventh Scudetto and a fourth Coppa Italia in a row, then if we get that particular trophy so much the better.

“He’s been at Juve for two years, he has consistency here. He’s young, he’s very happy here, the club and the fans all love him, as do we, and Juve helped him grow.

“Paulo will know what’s best for him, and we want him to stay.”

Higuain swapped Napoli for Juventus in a controversial transfer last year, and received criticism for his weight when he turned up for pre-season.  “I had a tough summer, it wasn’t easy to move from Napoli to Juventus. There was a lot of stress, people think it’s like buying a sandwich.

“I suffered a lot because I left a city which gave me so much, friends, a great group and great coaching staff.

“I was a bit unsettled but now I’m fine, I’ve come back in better mental, physical and emotional shape.

“The whistles at San Paolo? I only care about the opinions of teammates, family, friends, my club and people who know about this sport.

“I don’t talk about what I don’t know about - cooking for example - I listen so that I can learn.”

Pipita was also asked about the Old Lady’s summer signings, starting with winger Douglas Costa.

“He’s made a good impression,” Higuain said.

“As well as being a strong player, he puts in the fast crosses that I like. There have been important signings which will help the team grow.

“[Federico] Bernardeschi will have no problems because he’s Italian, it’ll be the same for [Mattia] De Sciglio and [Wojciech] Szczesny.

“[Rodrigo] Bentancur is young, we’ll help him and Douglas to adapt. We’ll have a quicker, more direct game.

“The 4-2-3-1? That’s the formation I’ve played all my life, that’s how we did great things last year.”

Milan are looking for a striker, but Higuain was asked if he’s still the best in Serie A.

“I have an answer, but I’ll keep it to myself and let you judge.”

Gonzalo Higuain believes the Scudetto is in Juventus’ hands - “every year they talk about other teams and in the end we always win”.

The Bianconeri have won the Scudetto for the past six years in a row, but the departure of Leonardo Bonucci and the strengthening of other sides has led to suggestions they could finally be unseated this year.

“For many years Bonucci helped Juve win,” Higuain acknowledged, speaking to reporters in the USA about the Milan centre-back.

“Now he’s gone to a direct rival but we remain very strong. We have the players to not feel his absence.

“Our first rivals are ourselves, we have to confirm what we’ve been doing for the past six years. Every year they talk about other teams, but in the end we always win.

“We can’t relax though, because it will be more difficult this year. The others have strengthened, so it will be a good season.

“Do Napoli worry me? Yes, because they haven’t changed anything, but we have a team which is so strong that we can fight for everything. Like last year.

“I’ve only won one [Scudetto] and I have the desire, the others do too or they wouldn’t keep going.

“Bonucci will be hungry, but we’ll have the same conviction to try and win a seventh title. When he plays against me, I’ll score.

“I know a bit more about him than during my time at Napoli, I always want to score.”

The Bianconeri reached the Champions League final last season, but were beaten 4-1 by Real Madrid in Cardiff.  “We had a very good approach, for the first 10 or 15 minutes we were better than Madrid.

“In the second half they were more angry, we relaxed and they massacred us. We could have done more, but the past is the past.

“We’re thinking of the new year, which will be harder and longer. We’re motivated and we really want to make up for last year.

“I always want to win and score more, even if we’d won the Champions League last year we couldn’t have let up.

“[Coach Massimiliano] Allegri is right when he says the final shouldn’t discredit our whole season. In two days we went from being the best team in Europe to an ordinary one.

“We don’t feel like the best team in Europe, but we’re not ordinary either. We can fight with the best.

“Allegri says I need to score more in the Champions League? He’s right.”

The Bianconeri sold Leonardo Bonucci to Milan earlier this month, leaving them a man short in central defence.

Manolas was on the verge of joining Zenit St Petersburg earlier this summer, but the deal collapsed due to a disagreement over wages.

The Lupi then declared that he was off the market, but SportItalia reports that the Greek international has a deal in principle with Juve.

Now the Turin giants must negotiate with Roma, and they’re said to be prepared to offer around €30m to sign Manolas.

Juventus have approached Schalke 04 to ask after Germany international Leon Goretzka, according to Italian reports.

Sports reporter Giovanni Albanese, who works for Il Fatto Quotidiano newspaper and Calciomercato.it, claims that important developments are expected over the next few days.

The 22-year-old already has nine senior caps for his country, in which he scored three goals.

His contract is due to expire in June 2018 and this could give Juve the edge in negotiations.

Schalke bought Goretzka from VfL Bochum in 2013 for €3.25m (£2.9m) and the current price-tag is over €25m (£22.3m).

Last season he contributed eight goals and six assists in 41 competitive games for Schalke.

Milan have also been linked with Goretzka, who plays primarily as a central midfielder.

尤文賣連干，博洛尼亞處於杆位

意大利媒體的報道相信，祖雲達斯正準備賣掉杜馬斯-連干，而博洛尼亞在這位中場球星的爭奪戰中領先費倫天拿、拖連奴和阿特蘭大。

按照意大利天空體育的説法，連干的經紀人已經和斑馬軍團的高層商談了自己客户目前的選擇。這位29歲的委内瑞拉國腳據説收到了來自博洛尼亞、拖連奴、阿特蘭大以及費倫天拿的邀請。

另一家意大利媒體《羅馬體育報》的記者柏度西(Matteo Pedrosi)則認為，博洛尼亞已經和尤文進行了深入談判，並且接近完成連干的交易。

該報道還指出，博洛尼亞簽下連干也會讓他們打開葛費特當沙的離隊大門，這位加納國腳也被認為是拖連奴的目標。

另一家意大利媒體《羅馬體育報》的記者柏度西(Matteo Pedrosi)則認為，博洛尼亞已經和尤文進行了深入談判，並且接近完成連干的交易。

該報道還指出，博洛尼亞簽下連干也會讓他們打開葛費特當沙的離隊大門，這位加納國腳也被認為是拖連奴的目標。

Napoli have officially confirmed they have won a court case with Juventus striker Gonzalo Higuain.

The Argentinian international left the Partenopei last summer after Juve activated his release clause, but he submitted a claim for €600,000 in unpaid image rights.

It was reported last week that the case had been dropped as Higuain’s lawyers hadn’t submitted the correct paperwork, and today Napoli have confirmed that they’ve won the case.

“SSC Napoli wins the arbitration ruling,” the Partenopei wrote on their official Twitter account.

“Higuain ordered to pay the court costs.”

Valencia & Juve want Krychowiak

Juventus have joined Valencia in the race for midfielder Grzegorz Krychowiak, who looks set to leave Paris Saint-Germain this summer, say reports.

Earlier this week PSG Coach Unai Emery confirmed the Poland international would leave the Parc des Princes this summer, a year after joining from Sevilla for €34m.

Plaza Deportiva, the holding midfield role is one which new Los Che boss Marcelino Garcia Toral is keen to address and see’s the former Bordeaux midfielder as ideal.

Whilst Krychowiak would require significant investment, the departures of Diego Alves, Mathew Ryan and Enzo Perez, alongside several more, should mean funds are available for incomings at the Mestalla.

However, Juve are also keen for the 27-year-old and a move to the Italian champions could mean Tomas Rincon and Mario Lemina leave the J-Stadium and join Valencia instead.

迪馬：尤文想召回斯湯馬士賓拿蘇拿

意大利《天空體育》的專家迪馬濟奧稱，祖雲達斯希望在今年夏天提前召回斯湯馬士賓拿蘇拿。

斯湯馬士賓拿蘇拿出自祖雲達斯青訓營，他可以勝任左前衞和左閘的位置。他在去年夏天被斑馬軍團租借到了阿特蘭大鍛鍊，租期將於2018年6月到期。

斯湯馬士賓拿蘇拿在2016-17賽季代表阿特蘭大征戰了32場比賽，其中有30次是首發登場，貢獻了5次助攻。他憑藉着在俱樂部的出色表現入選了意大利國家隊。

迪馬濟奧稱，祖雲達斯希望在今年夏天提前召回斯湯馬士賓拿蘇拿，阿特蘭大則希望留下這位意大利邊衞。不過這件事情現在似乎出現了轉機，斑馬軍團正在竭力勸説阿特蘭大放人，兩傢俱樂部的高層在過去幾個小時裏進行了談判，雙方的分歧正在逐漸縮小。

消息参考来源: 迪马济奥个人官网

貝拿迪斯治：10號靠自己爭取

在選擇了33號球衣之後，貝拿迪斯治解釋了自己沒有選擇祖雲達斯10號球衣的原因。

“我非常尊重尤文的10號球衣，所以我認為自己應該像當初在費倫天拿一樣，用表現證明自己配得上10號。”貝拿迪斯治在自己的亮相儀式上説道。

“新賽季我應該向俱樂部、主教練還有我的隊友們證明自己有資格穿上10號球衣。”

“我當然喜歡10號，但我必須證明自己配得上它。”

“我選擇33號是因為我信教，這同樣是個分量很重的號碼。”

“尤文代表着世界頂級俱樂部之一，同時尤文也是當今世界足壇排名前四或者前五的俱樂部，尤文的歷史也是世界足球歷史的一部分。”

“能加盟尤文讓我非常的激動。尤文的必勝信念和穩定表現是最讓我印象深刻的。”

“頑強、勇氣和決心，當你在球場上和尤文交手的時候，你能夠感受到他們身上的這些精神。”

Juventus are set to rival Arsenal for William Carvalho, according to Tuttosport.

The Turinese newspaper considers the 25-year-old Newcastle target to be a priority, alongside Blaise Matuidi, Adrien Rabiot and a number of other players.

The Bianconeri still won’t pay what PSG are asking for Matuidi, whom the Ligue 1 champions value at a lot more than the €15 million which Juventus won’t raise.

​Carvalho himself is said to be priced at €40m, with the Mirror recently claiming that Arsene Wenger had a special interest in him, and wanted to launch another bid worth €30 million.

The Portuguese international and Euro 2016 champion is more in favour of a move to the Gunners than one to St James’ Park.

​Carvalho is under contract to Lisbon until 2020 and has a massive €45 million release clause, too.

A holding midfielder with very good technique, he would be a part of Juve’s plan to add some fresh legs to their midfield. Matuidi, for his part, turned 30 this year.

Juventus are set to rival Arsenal for William Carvalho, according to Tuttosport.

The Turinese newspaper considers the 25-year-old Newcastle target to be a priority, alongside Blaise Matuidi, Adrien Rabiot and a number of other players.

The Bianconeri still won’t pay what PSG are asking for Matuidi, whom the Ligue 1 champions value at a lot more than the €15 million which Juventus won’t raise.

​Carvalho himself is said to be priced at €40m, with the Mirror recently claiming that Arsene Wenger had a special interest in him, and wanted to launch another bid worth €30 million.

The Portuguese international and Euro 2016 champion is more in favour of a move to the Gunners than one to St James’ Park.

​Carvalho is under contract to Lisbon until 2020 and has a massive €45 million release clause, too.

A holding midfielder with very good technique, he would be a part of Juve’s plan to add some fresh legs to their midfield. Matuidi, for his part, turned 30 this year.
